QAPair.Question: What is (are) Heart failure - home monitoring ?
QAPair.Answer: Heart failure is a condition in which the heart is no longer able to pump oxygen-rich blood to the rest of the body efficiently. This causes symptoms to occur throughout the body. Watching out for the warning signs that your heart failure is getting worse will help you catch problems before they become too serious.

Question.qtype: when to contact a medical professional

QAPair.Question: Do I need to see a doctor for Heart failure - home monitoring ?
